attributes.action: SAVE OUR SURGERY- RICHMOND HOUSE, WHITCHURCH SHROPSHIRE.
attributes.additional_details:
It has been in the local newspaper that the surgery will have to close due to funding cuts and struggling to find new premises  although it has been stated that the funding is there and this could have been resolved.
Although it was made aware in the media just recently that the NHS are giving GPS more funding! Empty builds in the town patients worried and funding gone it is despicable that the strain will land with 2 surgeries all ready stretched to the limits!
attributes.background:
For over 30 years richmond house has cared for more than 4000 patients and given jobs to people for over 10 years. 
They are a superb surgery keeping the doors open would help to keep our town thriving with good doctors.There are buildings sat empty which could be used for our surgery to stay open

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. While the Government is ultimately responsible for the NHS and accountable to Parliament, the day to day operational decisions are a matter for NHS England. You can contact NHS England using the details on the following website: https://www.england.nhs.uk/contact-us/
